body_html:
I've seen this error when using openblas from conda. It cannot find the gfortran libs that are linked to the openblas. Just add the /autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib to your LD_LIBRARY_PATH like @avmgithub proposed:

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/miniconda3/envs/pytorch/lib
